content: Hi All, does the cardinality of a display item have any meaning? If min cardinality is 1, does that mean that the display item has to be included in the result?

Hmm, never mind -- I just found the constraints that required and repeated aren't allowed for display items.
@Lloyd McKenzie may I suggest that the narrative rendering of a display item omit cardinality of display items? It is misleading.
Can you make an issue against the IGPublisher for that @Elliot Silver?
